original_title: Tommy Sandoval: On The Other Side
overview: Tommy Sandoval, On The Other Side, is a mini documentary that explores Tommy’s career ups and downs with Zero Skateboards and Fallen Footwear, his intense work ethic to continually produce amazing video parts, and how his excessive partying finally led him down the path of realizing that he needed to get sober. Now, that he’s on the other side of his career and wild lifestyle, Tommy is putting his family and skating first and foremost.
title: Tommy Sandoval: On The Other Side
